original_text: And she said unto her mistress, Would God my lord were with the prophet that is in Samaria! for he would recover him of his leprosy.
korean_text: 그의 여주인에게 이르되 우리 주인이 사마리아에 계신 선지자 앞에 계셨으면 좋겠나이다 그가 그 나병을 고치리이다 하는지라

sentences.original_text: And she said unto her mistress
Would God my lord were with the prophet
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이시여, 내 주인이 그 선지자와 함께 계셨더라면

sentences.original_text: for he would recover him of his leprosy
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 나의 주인을 나병에서 고치실 것입니다
